channel.title: Does Jagex copy things made on RSPS Servers?
channel.description:
While reading this update today I realized this that Jagex copied this from servers...
http://www.zybez.net/search.aspx?search_text=whip&x=0&y=0 Here is the link from RuneScape. http://services.runescape.com/m=news/newsitem.ws?id=2566
If you don't know what I am talking about.

item.title: Does Jagex copy things made on RSPS Servers?

item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

no thanks!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @eddyauto13 eddyauto13

@eddyauto13 wrote:

honestly were do you think the idea of RSPS’s come from obviously runescape people took RSPS off of runescape so in my opinion its only fair that they take some of our ideas.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Jagex copy things made on RSPS Servers?

item.title: Does Jagex copy things made on RSPS Servers?
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

[quote=“DemisePking, post:41, topic:326392”][quote author=imsokool22 link=topic=422803.msg3105388#msg3105388 date=1264103612]

The idea of colored whips, perhaps, but they started recoloring items (obviously) way before we did, like party hats and h’ween masks. This seems kind of odd though, unless they have some sort of metal type to them (Mithril, Rune, etc…).

I had heard a rumor a long time ago that Jagex copied the idea of Dragon boots off RSPS, but I don’t know how it can be confirmed.

Dude did you know rsps were made after rs got sucky… so they had the idea first rsps was the first one to produce it i think.
[/quote]

^^^^ wrong
rsps was made cause nubs were tired of working for items/stats, then GOOD rsps was made when PvP was killed.[/quote]
im srry to doubt you but i dont think your are correct(no offense)

Read full topic
item.source: Does Jagex copy things made on RSPS Servers?

I had heard a rumor a long time ago that Jagex copied the idea of Dragon boots off RSPS, but I don’t know how it can be confirmed.

[/quote]

item.title: Does Jagex copy things made on RSPS Servers?
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:38, topic:326392”][quote author=inertia link=topic=422803.msg3105228#msg3105228 date=1264088915]

[quote author=Spades link=topic=422803.msg3104987#msg3104987 date=1264053948]

Sometimes I wonder, if Jagex sends out their employees to act like a player, and to actually player a RSPS, just to spy on us. Or maybe i’m just being paranoid…-.-

They do. I heard they had a staff member play dodian that became an administrator. I can’t confirm it though.
[/quote]That’s stupid, pointless and a complete waste of time, resources and money.
[/quote]How? Dodian was selling membership i think. :|[/quote]Yeah but they can get that evidence just by logging in or looking at their website. Becoming an administrator isn’t going to do anything for Jagex because all they can do is reconnaissance type stuff which wouldn’t be much use to them. Anything malicious they manage to do is a legal risk to them without much effect on Dodian as they’ll have backups etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Jagex copy things made on RSPS Servers?

item.title: Does Jagex copy things made on RSPS Servers?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Private Servers had summoning before Runescape.

But does not mean they copied it. Almost every elf type game has necromancy or summoning.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Jagex copy things made on RSPS Servers?

item.title: Does Jagex copy things made on RSPS Servers?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:31, topic:326392”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=422803.msg3104789#msg3104789 date=1264043405]

Wow, I loved summoning, I played a couple of them servers once, I just had an army of about 50 goblins and skeletons, then I ordered them to attack some random bystander. ;D

This is what makes moparscape servers the BESTEST in the world.
[/quote]

Yeah…

4 years ago.[/quote]
Going old-school is the best, I still love to play good old Test-Scape.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Jagex copy things made on RSPS Servers?

item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

No. I don’t think Runescape is resorting to private server’s for ideas.

[ul][quote=“Niall, post:25, topic:326392”][quote author=CrisisX link=topic=422803.msg3104143#msg3104143 date=1263990896]
Things that Jagex have leeched
[list]
[li]Construction[/li][/list]
[/quote]

Because people haven’t been asking for construction since 2005…[/ul][/quote]

Leecher!
